items.description: Enter the bootstrap server URL (e.g., 'broker:9092', 'SASL_SSL://broker:9092'). Protocol prefix is optional and can be included in the URL or set separately in the protocol setting.

value.description: List of bootstrap servers. Protocol prefixes are optional.

items.description: Schema Registry URL. Must include scheme (http/https) and valid hostname.

value.description: Enter the Schema Registry URLs. Must include scheme (http/https) and valid hostname. Port is optional. Format: http(s)://hostname[:port][/path]
Enter the Connect worker URLs
Enter the Protocol value (e.g. SASL_SSL, PLAINTEXT, etc.)
Enter the SASL mechanism (PLAIN, SCRAM-SHA-256, SCRAM-SHA-512).

Enter the JAAS config string. For SCRAM-SHA-256 or SCRAM-SHA-512: org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.ScramLoginModule required username="<user>" password="<pass>"; 

For AWS_MSK_IAM: software.amazon.msk.auth.iam.IAMLoginModule required; and additionalProperties sasl.client.callback.handler.class: software.amazon.msk.auth.iam.IAMClientCallbackHandler

sslKeystore.description: Unique keystore (JKS) file name in double quotes. Must end with .jks

file.description: Enter a unique keystore (JKS) file name in double quotes. Must end with .jks

value.description: Enter a password for the keystore.
Enter key password (can be empty).

sslTruststore.description: Unique truststore (JKS) file name in double quotes. Must end with .jks

file.description: Enter a unique truststore (JKS) file name in double quotes. Must end with .jks

value.description: Enter a password for the truststore.
Enter the name of the SSL algorithm (non empty).

additionalProperties.description: Additional configuration properties for Kafka client (REQUIRED FOR AWS MSK IAM.

value.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs for additional Kafka client properties.

metricsType.description: Enter the type of metrics to collect (e.g., 'JMX', 'JOLOKIAG', 'JOLOKIAP', 'AWS').

metricsHttpSuffix.description: Custom HTTP suffix for metrics endpoint.

metricsHttpTimeout.description: HTTP request timeout in milliseconds for metrics collection.

metricsCustomUrlMappings.description: Map of custom URL mappings for metrics

metricsRateLimitingMaxRetries.description: HTTP retries when 429 is returned for Jolokia metrics

metricsRateLimitingBackoff.description: Backoff interval (ms) when 429 is returned for Jolokia metrics

value.description: Enter the username (non empty).
Enter the password (non empty).

basicAuthCredentialsSource.description: Source for the basic auth credentials.

value.description: Enter source for the basic auth credentials.
Enter the basic auth user information (non empty).

value.description: Enter the AWS region.

secretAccessKey.description: Reference to AWS connection for secret access key.

sessionToken.description: Specifies the session token value that is required when you are using temporary credentials that you receive from AWS STS.

value.description: Enter the session token value (non empty).

value.description: Enter the Glue Registry ARN (non empty).

glueRegistryCacheTtl.description: The period of time in milliseconds to cache the Schema Registry information, if not set, 24 hours

value.description: Enter the registry cache ttl (non empty).

glueRegistryDefaultCompatibility.description: The default compatibility level for the Schema Registry.

Enter the Alert Manager endpoints (at least one required).

host.description: The host name for the Splunk API.

insecure.description: Set to true in order to disable SSL verification.

hardDelete.description: If true, delete resources instead of soft-deleting them.

value.description: Hard delete flag.

Enter the integration key value (non empty).

site.description: The site URL for the DataDog API.

Enter the API key value (non empty).
Enter the application key value (non empty).

creds.description: An array of (secret) strings to be passed over to alert channel plugins.

sslEnabledProtocols.title: LensesHQ SSL Enabled Protocols
sslEnabledProtocols.description: The list of SSL/TLS protocols enabled for communication with the LensesHQ server.

algorithm.title: LensesHQ SSL algorithm
algorithm.description: The SSL algorithm to use when establishing the connection.

cipherSuites.title: LensesHQ Cipher Suites
cipherSuites.description: The list of cipher suites supported for encryption in communication with the LensesHQ server.

maxBackOffInterval.title: LensesHQ Max BackOff Interval
maxBackOffInterval.description: The maximum interval for backoff retries in communication with the LensesHQ server.

isShutDownInterval.title: LensesHQ ShutDown Interval
isShutDownInterval.description: The interval for shutting down the LensesHQ server gracefully.

connectTimeout.title: LensesHQ Connection Timeout
connectTimeout.description: The timeout duration for establishing a connection with the LensesHQ server.

maxJitterWindowMilliseconds.title: LensesHQ Max Jitter Window Milliseconds
maxJitterWindowMilliseconds.description: The maximum duration of jitter window in milliseconds for retries in communication with the LensesHQ server.

configuration.title: Kafka Configuration
configuration.description: Kafka connection configuration with SASL and SSL validation rules.

allOf.title: SASL PLAIN Mechanism Validation
allOf.description: When SASL mechanism is PLAIN, saslJaasConfig must contain valid PlainLoginModule configuration

allOf.title: SASL AWS MSK IAM Mechanism Validation
allOf.description: When SASL mechanism is AWS_MSK_IAM, additionalProperties must contain IAMClientCallbackHandler configuration

allOf.title: SASL SCRAM Mechanism Validation
allOf.description: When SASL mechanism is SCRAM-SHA-256 or SCRAM-SHA-512, saslJaasConfig must contain valid ScramLoginModule configuration

allOf.title: SASL AWS MSK IAM JAAS Configuration
allOf.description: When SASL mechanism is AWS_MSK_IAM, saslJaasConfig must contain IAMLoginModule configuration
